page.title: 18CHURCH STRETTON SCHOOLS
page.content: There are two schools in Church Sretton, one primary,{St. Lawrence's and one comprehensive,{Church Stretton {School. When children are five they start at the bottom of the primary school. There are eight classes, about 230 children and ten teachers in this school. Children leave this school at the age of 11 and move into the comprehensive until they are 16. The comprehensive school has a head mistress and the primary has a head master. The comprehensive has about 600 pupils and 35 teachers. So you can imagine how big it is. The schools are right next door to each other and share a playing field and swimming pool. The schools are beautifully situated and are overlooked by the Church Stretton hills.
